# session

**Instance Property**

A contract to declare an AR session.

## Declaration

```swift
var session: ARSession { get }
```

## Discussion

Some clients may use key-value observation (KVO) to be notified when this property changes values. To support KVO, Swift classes that adopt [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARSessionProviding] should mark its [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARSessionProviding/session] as `@objc` and `dynamic`.
title: session
